text: Abdulkadir Mohamed Farah (15 February 1961 â€“ 24 March 2020) was a Somali footballer. He was born in Beledweyne, Somalia. Farah began his career in 1976. He played at the regional level before playing club football for Batroolka.coronavirus: Former African footballer Mohamed Farah dies due to COVID-19 | Football News - Times of India He also represented the Somali national team. Farah died in a hospital in London from COVID-19 on 24 March 2020, aged 59. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Somali sportspeople Category:African footballers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London
title: Mohamed Farah (footballer)
